name: Ceremony of the Strengthened Hand
summary: Your exoskeleton's weapons are even more potent.
description:
Your exoskeleton's weapons are even more potent. If you have a claws unarmed attack, it gains the deadly d8 trait. If you have a branch unarmed attack, it gains the shove and trip traits.Traits

Conrasu: A people that are made of cosmic force given consciousness and housed within unique exoskeletons. Conrasus craft and use these weapons.
